thread.title: SFO probes 'whether Bank of England advised lenders during auctions'
thread.title_full: SFO probes 'whether Bank of England advised lenders during auctions'

author: Andrew Trotman
title: SFO probes 'whether Bank of England advised lenders during auctions'
text: Banks and Finance SFO probes 'whether Bank of England advised lenders during auctions' Banks were allegedly told to offer the same amount of collateral during the auctions for central bank funds The probe is the first targeting the Bank in the SFO's 28-year history Photo: PA
